query.statement: --파일저장 INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPST0413F ( MANDT , PSPID , POSID , LIFNR , SEQ , JOB_CODE , P_CODE , FNAME , FNAME_APP , FSIZE , FPATH , META_CRDAT , COMMNT , CRDAT , CRTIM , CRNAM , CHDAT , CHTIM , CHNAM , DEL_INDC ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #PSPID# , #POSID# , #LIFNR# , VALUE(( SELECT (INT(VALUE(MAX(SEQ), '0')) + 1) AS SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0413F WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PSPID = #PSPID# AND POSID = #POSID# AND LIFNR = #LIFNR# WITH UR ),1) , #JOB_CODE# , #P_CODE# , #FNAME# , #FNAME_APP# , #FSIZE# , #FPATH# , #META_CRDAT# , #COMMENT# , HEX(CURRENT DATE) , HEX(CURRENT TIME) , #G_USER_ID# , '' , '' , '' , 'N' )
